HaddySkelly, i think your player doesn't have stream switcher (thingy that allows it to play either one or another stream). I don't know how to fix that for iTunes. Other players shouldn't have this problem.

kdawg69, original Season 1. Just higher quality than before (i've made another release of this season two years ago, but this release is better).

uhh how do i switch the language O.o
do i need a program to do it with?
Any half-decent media player (that is, VLC, *mplayer, MediaPlayerClassic, Gnome player) would offer you an ability (usually - via its main menu) to switch audio tracks. Read the manual.
